Kube PlatformSetup Guide & Documentation

Deploy, manage, and scale your Pi-based K3s cluster with ease

Content Library

Learn the lifecycle of cluster managment from hardware provisioning and configuration to orchestration and service deployment.

Automation

Automate each server. OS setup on baremetal, automated and seamless deployment of cluster nodes using Ansible and cloud-init.

Resillience

Maintain ressillience and availability of the service through use of encrpytion, secure netwrok practices, high availaiblity and load balancing as well as back up and restore in a scenario of full failure.
